name: Hordelicious (itch)
description:
Hordelicious is a wave based arena shooter game where you fight against hordes of enemies with 50 randomly looted weapons and 16 different items/upgrades that can be purchased from the shop after every wave.


The Backstory:

Your original mission was to explore the new planet we found.

We knew about the life forms of the planet, but what we didn't know was that these creatures

actually worship the planet itself.

Now we have disgraced their holy ground with our human feet and angered the creatures of this planet.

You have to forget our original plans and fight your way out of there!



Features:

- 50 Weapons

- 16 Items/Upgrades

- Boss Battles

- Unlockable Boss Arena
